frontmatter.title: Getting Started With Unity and Virtual Reality
frontmatter.excerpt: Virtual reality is incredibly immersive and a blast to play with. The Oculus Quest 2 has made it more accessible than ever before. Best practices for setting up your environment and building a game have changed frequently enough that it can be hard to find current tutorials and examples without getting confused.

node.excerpt: The Oculus Quest is entirely immersive and a blast to play with. Of course, the moment I put it on, I immediately wanted to make my own…

frontmatter.title: Developing for the Oculus Quest
frontmatter.excerpt: Everyone wants to talk about consumer VR. I just want to make some games.
